entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
